p: The concern about the pandemic might have amplified the purchase of antiviral drugs, likely due to the information campaign about the use of antivirals for treating H1N1 infections. This example provides an empirical evidence that the Italian population have actively enacted spontaneous defensive response measures aimed at reducing the risk of infection in response to the high perceived risk. A discussion on this topic, including other (empirical) sources of information supporting the hypothesis of an initial overestimation of the risks of the pandemic, is developed in Â [ 18].
